id.FIXME: may be there, type not known (string? number?)
id.description: Unique id used to refer to this feature within this dataset, generated by database.

region_ids.description: Id of the regions containing this feature, managed by database.

geojson_id.description: Id of the geojson for this feature, managed by database.

source_name.description: Name of the original data source.

source_id.description: Id of the feature in original data source.

region_source_name.description: Name of the original taxlot data source.

region_source_ids.description: Source id of the regions this feature is located in.

legal_name.description: Legal name used to identify this feature.

census_tract.description: Four to six digit census tract id.

census_block_group.description: Census block group within the census tract.

census_block.description: Census block within the census block group.
